data.comment: The match has started at Arena do Gremio.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Raphael Claus signals a Gremio throw-in in Internacional's half.
Throw-in Internacional.
Diego Souza has recovered and rejoins the match in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 5, Raphael Claus waits before resuming play because Diego Souza for Gremio is still down.
In Porto Alegre Gremio's Alisson is caught offside.
In the minute 6, Thiago Galhardo for the away team is judged to be offside.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Gremio are pushing forward but Pepe's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 12, Internacional have a goal kick.
Diego Souza (Gremio) strikes at Arena do Gremio but his header is cleared.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Gremio.
Heitor of Internacional gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 20, Gremio to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Internacional at Arena do Gremio.
Raphael Claus signals a Internacional throw-in in Gremio's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in high up the field for Gremio in Porto Alegre.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a Internacional throw-in in Gremio's half.
In the minute 27, Gremio drive upfield and Matheus Henrique gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Internacional defender.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 28, David Braz (Gremio) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 29, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gremio close to the penalty box.
Important block from the Internacional defence as Matheus Henrique fires in a strike for Gremio.
Free kick Internacional.
In the minute 31, Raphael Claus awards Gremio a goal kick.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Raphael Claus awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Gremio have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Gremio.
Internacional's Thiago Galhardo is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Thiago Galhardo.
In Porto Alegre Gremio drive forward through Lucas Silva. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 39, Matheus Henrique for Gremio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Internacional at Arena do Gremio.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 42, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Internacional.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Porto Alegre.
Raphael Claus has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick Gremio.
Victor Cuesta (Internacional) has received a first yellow card.
David Braz (Gremio) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 48, Raphael Claus awards Internacional a goal kick.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gremio's Bruno Cortes has been booked in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 49, Heitor is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Heitor is back on his feet again.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 51, Raphael Claus signals a Gremio throw-in in Internacional's half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Gremio.
Pepe is on target to give Gremio a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 53, Diego Souza with an assist there.
Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
William Pottker is on a sub for Gabriel Boschilia for Internacional.
In the minute 63, The home team have replaced Alisson with Robinho. This is the first substitution made today by Renato Gaucho.
Eduardo Coudet (Internacional) is making a second substitution, with Andres D'Alessandro replacing Abel Hernandez.
In the minute 64, It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Raphael Claus awards Gremio a goal kick.
In the minute 67, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Attention is being given to Gremio’s Diego Souza and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 70, Damian Musto (Internacional) has been sent off!
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Arena do Gremio, Bruno Cortes has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
In the minute 78, Goal! Edenilson equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Luiz Fernando is replacing Darlan Mendes for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Internacional's Patrick attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 89, William Pottker for Internacional drives towards goal at Arena do Gremio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Internacional's area.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Raphael Claus blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
